posts.description: Programs designed to mimic real users made off with 250 gigabytes of personal information from the network's users, researchers found. Read this blog post by Steven Musil on Security.

posts.message: Today I'm gonna share with you a very precious secret that will help Web designer and Developers writing less code and use their time more efficiently. What i'm sharing is Zen Coding which you write small command and it generate for you a huge bunch of code. for Windows users they can use it with Sublime text 2 and Mac users it works on every single good IDE such as Text Mate, Sublime, etc... http://code.google.com/p/zen-coding/wiki/SublimeTextZenCodingEn Mohamed Yosry, Aboulroom .. Mahmoud Abd El-Fattah, Mohamed El Sayed
posts.caption: code.google.com
posts.description: the css deal is F1, the Koan screen is ctl-alt-enter and it works in CSS/HTML pages alike, and if you type the Koan stuff directly into the editor, then do alt-e, it converts it to the HTML that you want (though it doesn't build it in real-time like Koan does).
